validation.contact-invalid: Contact must be a valid mail address

help.namespaceHelpText: The namespace of the repository. This name will be part of the repository url.
help.nameHelpText: The name of the repository. This name will be part of the repository url.
help.typeHelpText: The type of the repository (e.g. Mercurial, Git or Subversion).
help.contactHelpText: Email address of the person who is responsible for this repository.
help.descriptionHelpText: A short description of the repository.
help.initializeRepository: Creates an initial branch and commits a basic README.md.

changesets.noChangesets: No changesets found for this branch. The commits could have been removed.

changeset.diffNotSupported: Diff of changesets is not supported by the type of repository

file-tree.name: Name
file-tree.notYetComputed: Not yet computed, will be updated in a short while
file-tree.computationAborted: The computation took too long and was aborted

sources.noSources: No sources found for this branch.
sources.moreFilesAvailable: These are just the first {{count}} files. There are more files available.

confirm-alert.title: Delete permission
confirm-alert.message: Do you really want to delete the permission?

add-permission.name-input-invalid: Permission is not allowed to be empty! If it is not empty, your input name is invalid or it already exists!

help.groupPermissionHelpText: States if a permission is a group permission. If this is not checked, it is a user permission.
help.nameHelpText: Manage permissions for a specific user or group.
help.roleHelpText: READ = read; WRITE = read and write; OWNER = read, write and also the ability to manage the properties and permissions. If nothing is selected here, use the 'Advanced' Button to see detailed permissions.
help.permissionsHelpText: Use this to specify your own set of permissions regardless of predefined roles.

confirmAlert.message: Do you really want to delete the repository?

diff.noDiffFound: No Diff between the selected branches found.

fileUpload.clickHere: Click here to select your file
